Parameters: boolean: True if an action bar menu is now visible, false if no action bar menus are visible.
onMenuVisibilityChanged(boolean).Description: Called when an action bar menu is shown or hidden. Applications may want to use this to tune auto-hiding behavior for the action bar or pause/resume video playback, gameplay, or other activity within the main content area.

ClassDesc: Listener for receiving events when action bar menus are shown or hidden.
